Classes/Promise.html#/c:@M@FWFramework@o.name: defaultError
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@M@FWFramework@o.abstract: 约定默认错误，约定失败时可选使用，可用于错误判断，支持自定义

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@M@FWFramework@o.name: validationError
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@M@FWFramework@o.abstract: 约定验证错误，验证失败时默认使用，可用于错误判断，支持自定义

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@M@FWFramework@o.name: timeoutError
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@M@FWFramework@o.abstract: 约定超时错误，约定超时时默认使用，可用于错误判断，支持自定义

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@M@FWFramework@o.name: init(block:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@M@FWFramework@o.abstract: 指定操作成功和失败句柄初始化

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@M@FWFramework@o.name: init(progress:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@M@FWFramework@o.abstract: 指定操作成功、失败句柄和进度句柄初始化

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: all(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 全部约定，所有约定成功才返回约定结果合集；如果某一个失败了，则返回该错误信息；约定进度为所有约定总进度

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: any(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 某个约定，返回最先成功的约定结果；如果都失败了，返回最后一个错误信息；约定进度为最先成功的约定进度

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: race(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 约定竞速，返回最先结束的约定结果，不管成功或失败；约定进度为最先结束的约定进度

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: delay(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 延时约定，延时完成时必定成功

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: retry(_:delay:block:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 约定重试，block需返回新创建的约定，该约定失败时延迟指定时间后重新创建并执行，直至成功或达到最大重试次数(总次数retry+1)

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: done(_:catch:finally:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 执行约定并分别回调成功、失败句柄，统一回调收尾句柄

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: done(_:catch:progress:finally:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 执行约定并分别回调成功、失败句柄、进度句柄，统一回调收尾句柄

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: then(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 执行当前约定，成功时调用句柄处理结果或者返回下一个约定

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: recover(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 执行当前约定，失败时调用句柄恢复结果或者返回下一个约定

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: validate(_:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 验证约定，当前约定成功时验证结果，可返回Bool或Error?；验证通过时返回结果，验证失败时返回验证错误

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: reduce(_:reducer:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 减少约定，当前约定结果作为初始值value，顺序使用value和数组值item调用reducer，产生新的value继续循环直至结束，类似数组reduce方法

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: delay(_:force:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 约定延时，当前约定成功时延时返回结果；默认失败时不延时，可设置force强制失败时也延时

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: timeout(_:error:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 约定超时，当前约定未超时时返回结果；否则返回超时错误信息

Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.name: retry(_:delay:block:)
Classes/Promise.html#/c:@CM@FWFramework@.abstract: 约定重试，block需返回新创建的约定，当前约定失败时延迟指定时间后调用block创建约定并执行，直至成功或达到最大重试次数

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: maxYViewExpanded

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 从字符串初始化日期，自定义格式(默认yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss)和时区(默认当前时区)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: attributedString(_:font:textColor:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 执行解锁(支持任意对象)，发送信号量，自动创建信号量

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setObject(_:forKey:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 保存对象，支持archive对象

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardManager
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否启用键盘管理(自动滚动)，默认NO

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardDistance
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置输入框和键盘的空白间距，默认10.0

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: reboundDistance
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置输入框和键盘的回弹触发最小距离，默认0始终回弹

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardResign
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否启用键盘后台关闭处理，退后台时收起键盘，回到前台时恢复键盘，解决系统退后台输入框跳动问题，默认NO

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: touchResign
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否启用点击背景关闭键盘(会继续触发其它点击事件)，默认NO

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardScrollView
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 指定用于键盘管理滚动的scrollView，默认为nil，通过修改VC.view.frame实现

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: returnResign
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 点击键盘完成按钮是否关闭键盘，默认NO，二选一

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: returnNext
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置点击键盘完成按钮是否自动切换下一个输入框，二选一

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: returnBlock
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置点击键盘完成按钮的事件句柄

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardToolbar
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取关联的键盘Toolbar对象，可自定义样式

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: toolbarPreviousButton
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义键盘Toolbar上一个按钮，支持图片|字符串等(详见FWBlock)，默认朝上的箭头

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: toolbarNextButton
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义键盘Toolbar下一个按钮，支持图片|字符串等(详见FWBlock)，默认朝下的箭头

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: toolbarDoneButton
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义键盘Toolbar完成按钮，支持图片|字符串等(详见FWBlock)，默认Done

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: previousResponder
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击前一个按钮时聚焦的输入框句柄，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: nextResponder
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击下一个按钮时聚焦的输入框句柄，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: previousResponderTag
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击前一个按钮时聚焦的输入框tag，默认0不生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: nextResponderTag
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击下一个按钮时聚焦的输入框tag，默认0不生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: goPrevious()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自动跳转前一个输入框，优先使用previousResponder，其次根据responderTag查找

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: goNext()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自动跳转后一个输入框，优先使用nextResponder，其次根据responderTag查找

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardHeight(_:)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否启用键盘后台关闭处理，退后台时收起键盘，回到前台时恢复键盘，解决系统退后台输入框跳动问题，默认NO

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否启用点击背景关闭键盘(会继续触发其它点击事件)，默认NO

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 指定用于键盘管理滚动的scrollView，默认为nil，通过修改VC.view.frame实现

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: toolbarNextButton
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义键盘Toolbar下一个按钮，支持图片|字符串等(详见FWBlock)，默认朝下的箭头

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: toolbarDoneButton
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义键盘Toolbar完成按钮，支持图片|字符串等(详见FWBlock)，默认Done

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: previousResponder
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击前一个按钮时聚焦的输入框句柄，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: nextResponder
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击下一个按钮时聚焦的输入框句柄，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: previousResponderTag
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击前一个按钮时聚焦的输入框tag，默认0不生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: nextResponderTag
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击下一个按钮时聚焦的输入框tag，默认0不生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: goPrevious()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自动跳转前一个输入框，优先使用previousResponder，其次根据responderTag查找

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: goNext()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自动跳转后一个输入框，优先使用nextResponder，其次根据responderTag查找

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardHeight(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取键盘弹出时的高度，对应Key为UIKeyboardFrameEndUserInfoKey

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: keyboardAnimate(_:animations:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 执行键盘跟随动画，支持AutoLayout，可通过keyboardHeight:获取键盘高度

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addToolbar(title:doneBlock:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加Toolbar，指定标题和完成句柄，使用默认按钮

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addToolbar(titleItem:previousItem:nextItem:doneItem:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加Toolbar，指定居中标题、左侧上一个、下一个按钮和右边按钮

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: placeholder
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 占位文本，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: placeholderColor
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 占位颜色，默认系统颜色

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: attributedPlaceholder
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 带属性占位文本，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: placeholderInset
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义占位文本内间距，默认zero与内容一致

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: verticalAlignment
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义垂直分布方式，会自动修改contentInset，默认Top与系统一致

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: autoHeightEnabled
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否启用自动高度功能，随文字改变高度

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: maxHeight
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 最大高度，默认CGFLOAT_MAX，启用自动高度后生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: minHeight
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 最小高度，默认0，启用自动高度后生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: heightDidChange
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 高度改变回调句柄，默认nil，启用自动高度后生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: autoHeight(maxHeight:didChange:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快捷启用自动高度，并设置最大高度和回调句柄

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: commonDisplayLink(target:selector:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建CADisplayLink，使用target-action，自动CommonModes添加到当前的运行循环中，避免ScrollView滚动时不触发

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: commonDisplayLink(block:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建CADisplayLink，使用block，自动CommonModes添加到当前的运行循环中，避免ScrollView滚动时不触发

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: displayLink(block:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建CADisplayLink，使用block，需要调用addToRunLoop:forMode:安排到当前的运行循环中(CommonModes避免ScrollView滚动时不触发)。

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: startBlock
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置动画开始回调，需要在add之前添加，因为add时会自动拷贝一份对象

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: stopBlock
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置动画停止回调

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeBackgroundColor
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置主题背景色，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeBorderColor
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置主题边框色，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeShadowColor
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置主题阴影色，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeContents
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置主题内容图片，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeColors
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置主题渐变色，启用主题订阅后可跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: color
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取当前主题样式对应静态颜色，主要用于iOS13以下兼容主题切换

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: color(forStyle:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 指定主题样式获取对应静态颜色，iOS13+可跟随系统改变

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: isThemeColor
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否是主题颜色，仅支持判断使用fwTheme创建的颜色

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeLight(_:dark:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 动态创建主题色，分别指定浅色和深色

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeColor(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 动态创建主题色，指定提供句柄

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeNamed(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 动态创建主题色，指定名称，兼容iOS11+系统方式(仅iOS13+支持动态颜色)和手工指定。失败时返回clear防止崩溃

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeNamed(_:bundle:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 动态创建主题色，指定名称和bundle，兼容iOS11+系统方式(仅iOS13+支持动态颜色)和手工指定。失败时返回clear防止崩溃

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setThemeColor(_:forName:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 手工单个注册主题色，未配置主题色或者需兼容iOS11以下时可使用本方式

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setThemeColors(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 手工批量注册主题色，未配置主题色或者需兼容iOS11以下时可使用本方式

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取当前主题样式对应静态图片用于显示，iOS13+可跟随系统改变

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(forStyle:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 指定主题样式获取对应静态图片用于显示，iOS13+可跟随系统改变

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: isThemeImage
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否是主题图片，仅支持判断使用fwTheme创建的图片

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeImage
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速生成当前图片对应的默认主题图片

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeImage(color:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 指定主题颜色，快速生成当前图片对应的主题图片

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeLight(_:dark:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建主题模拟动态图像，分别指定浅色和深色，不支持动态切换，需重新赋值才会变化

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeImage(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建主题模拟动态图像，指定提供句柄，不支持动态切换，需重新赋值才会变化

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeNamed(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建主题模拟动态图像，指定名称，兼容系统方式(仅iOS13+支持动态图像)和手工指定，支持动态切换，需配置any和dark

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeNamed(_:bundle:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建主题模拟动态图像，指定名称和bundle，兼容系统方式(仅iOS13+支持动态图像)和手工指定，支持动态切换，需配置any和dark

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setThemeImage(_:forName:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 手工单个注册主题图像，未配置主题图像时可使用本方式

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setThemeImages(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 手工批量注册主题图像，未配置主题图像时可使用本方式

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeImageColor
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 默认主题图片颜色，未设置时为浅色=>黑色，深色=>白色

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取当前主题样式对应静态图片用于显示，iOS13+可跟随系统改变

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(forStyle:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 指定主题样式获取对应静态图片用于显示，iOS13+可跟随系统改变

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: isThemeAsset
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否是主题图片资源，仅支持判断使用fwTheme创建的图片资源

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeLight(_:dark:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建主题动态图片资源，分别指定浅色和深色，系统方式，推荐使用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeAsset(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建主题动态图片资源，指定提供句柄，内部使用FWThemeObject实现

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeContext
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 订阅主题通知并指定主题上下文(如vc|view)，非UITraitEnvironment等需指定后才能响应系统主题

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addThemeListener(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加iOS13主题改变通知回调，返回订阅唯一标志，需订阅后才生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: removeThemeListener(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: iOS13根据订阅唯一标志移除主题通知回调

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: removeAllThemeListeners()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: iOS13移除所有主题通知回调，一般用于cell重用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeChanged(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: iOS13主题改变包装器钩子，如果父类有重写，记得调用super，需订阅后才生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeImage
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置主题图片，自动跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil，二选一

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: themeAsset
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置主题图片资源，自动跟随系统改变，清空时需置为nil，二选一

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: appName
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取应用名称

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: appDisplayName
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取应用显示名称，未配置时读取名称

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: appVersion
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取应用主版本号，示例：1.0.0

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: appBuildVersion
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取应用构建版本号，示例：1.0.0.1

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: appIdentifier
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取应用唯一标识

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: appExecutable
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取应用可执行程序名称

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: canOpenURL(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 能否打开URL(NSString|NSURL)，需配置对应URL SCHEME到Info.plist才能返回YES

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openURL(_:completionHandler:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开URL，支持NSString|NSURL，完成时回调，即使未配置URL SCHEME，实际也能打开成功，只要调用时已打开过对应App

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openUniversalLinks(_:completionHandler:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开通用链接URL，支持NSString|NSURL，完成时回调。如果是iOS10+通用链接且安装了App，打开并回调YES，否则回调NO

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: isSystemURL(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 判断URL是否是系统链接(如AppStore|电话|设置等)，支持NSString|NSURL

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: isHttpURL(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 判断URL是否HTTP链接，支持NSString|NSURL

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: isAppStoreURL(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 判断URL是否是AppStore链接，支持NSString|NSURL

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openAppStore(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开AppStore下载页

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openAppStoreReview(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开AppStore评价页

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openAppReview()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开应用内评价，有次数限制

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openAppSettings()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开系统应用设置页

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openMailApp(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开系统邮件App

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openMessageApp(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开系统短信App

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openPhoneApp(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开系统电话App

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openActivityItems(_:excludedTypes:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开系统分享

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openSafariController(_:completionHandler:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开内部浏览器，支持NSString|NSURL，点击完成时回调

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openMessageController(_:completionHandler:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开短信控制器，完成时回调

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openMailController(_:completionHandler:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开邮件控制器，完成时回调

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openStoreController(_:completionHandler:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开Store控制器，完成时回调

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openVideoPlayer(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开视频播放器，支持AVPlayerItem|NSURL|NSString

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: openAudioPlayer(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 打开音频播放器，支持NSURL|NSString

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: color(alpha:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取当前颜色指定透明度的新颜色

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: hexValue
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取颜色的十六进制值RGB，不含透明度

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: alphaValue
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取颜色的透明度值，范围0~1

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: hexString
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取颜色的十六进制字符串RGB，不含透明度

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: hexAlphaString
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 读取颜色的十六进制字符串RGBA|ARGB(透明度为1时RGB)，包含透明度

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: colorStandardARGB
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置十六进制颜色标准为ARGB|RGBA，启用为ARGB，默认为RGBA

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: randomColor
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取透明度为1.0的RGB随机颜色

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: color(hex:alpha:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 从十六进制值初始化，格式：0x20B2AA，透明度默认1.0

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: color(hexString:alpha:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 从十六进制字符串初始化，支持RGB、RGBA|ARGB，格式：@“20B2AA”, @“#FFFFFF"，透明度默认1.0，失败时返回clear

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: color(string:alpha:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 从颜色字符串初始化，支持十六进制和颜色值，透明度默认1.0，失败时返回clear

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: fontBlock
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 全局自定义字体句柄，优先调用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: autoScale
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否自动等比例缩放字体，默认NO

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: thinFont(ofSize:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 返回系统Thin字体

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: lightFont(ofSize:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 返回系统Light字体

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: font(ofSize:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 返回系统Regular字体

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: mediumFont(ofSize:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 返回系统Medium字体

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: semiboldFont(ofSize:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 返回系统Semibold字体

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: boldFont(ofSize:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 返回系统Bold字体

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: font(ofSize:weight:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 创建指定尺寸和weight的系统字体

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(alpha:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 从当前图片创建指定透明度的图片

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(tintColor:blendMode:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 从当前UIImage混合颜色创建UIImage，可自定义模式，默认destinationIn

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(scaleSize:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 缩放图片到指定大小

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(scaleSize:contentMode:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 缩放图片到指定大小，指定模式

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: draw(in:contentMode:clipsToBounds:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 按指定模式绘制图片

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(cropRect:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 裁剪指定区域图片

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(insets:color:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 指定颜色填充图片边缘

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(capInsets:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 拉伸图片(平铺模式)，指定端盖区域（不拉伸区域）

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(capInsets:resizingMode:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 拉伸图片(指定模式)，指定端盖区域（不拉伸区域）。Tile为平铺模式，Stretch为拉伸模式

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(cornerRadius:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 生成圆角图片

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(rotateDegree:fitSize:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 按角度常数(0~360)转动图片，指定图片尺寸是否延伸来适应内容，否则图片尺寸不变，内容被裁剪，默认true

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(maskImage:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 生成mark图片

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(mergeImage:atPoint:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 图片合并，并制定叠加图片的起始位置

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(filter:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 图片应用CIFilter滤镜处理

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: compressImage(maxLength:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 压缩图片到指定字节，图片太大时会改为JPG格式。不保证图片大小一定小于该大小

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: compressData(maxLength:compressRatio:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 压缩图片到指定字节，图片太大时会改为JPG格式，可设置递减压缩率，默认0.1。不保证图片大小一定小于该大小

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: compressImage(maxWidth:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 长边压缩图片尺寸，获取等比例的图片

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: scaleSize(maxWidth:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 通过指定图片最长边，获取等比例的图片size

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: originalImage
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取原始渲染模式图片，始终显示原色，不显示tintColor。默认自动根据上下文

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: templateImage
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取模板渲染模式图片，始终显示tintColor，不显示原色。默认自动根据上下文

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: hasAlpha
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 判断图片是否有透明通道

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: pixelSize
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取当前图片的像素大小，多倍图会放大到一倍

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(view:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 从视图创建UIImage，生成截图，主线程调用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(color:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 从颜色创建UIImage，尺寸默认1x1

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(color:size:cornerRadius:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 从颜色创建UIImage，可指定尺寸和圆角，默认圆角0

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: image(size:block:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 从block创建UIImage，指定尺寸

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: saveImage(completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 保存图片到相册，保存成功时error为nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: saveVideo(_:completion:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 保存视频到相册，保存成功时error为nil。如果视频地址为NSURL，需使用NSURL.path

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: top
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 顶部纵坐标，frame.origin.y

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: bottom
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 底部纵坐标，frame.origin.y + frame.size.height

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: left
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 左边横坐标，frame.origin.x

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: right
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 右边横坐标，frame.origin.x + frame.size.width

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: width
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 宽度，frame.size.width

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: height
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 高度，frame.size.height

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: centerX
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 中心横坐标，center.x

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: centerY
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 中心纵坐标，center.y

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: x
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 起始横坐标，frame.origin.x

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: y
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 起始纵坐标，frame.origin.y

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: origin
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 起始坐标，frame.origin

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: size
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 大小，frame.size

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: visibleState
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 当前生命周期状态，默认Ready

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: visibleStateChanged
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 生命周期变化时通知句柄，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: completionResult
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义完成结果对象，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: completionHandler
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义完成句柄，默认nil，dealloc时自动调用，参数为fwCompletionResult。支持提前调用，调用后需置为nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: allowsPopGesture
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义侧滑返回手势VC开关句柄，enablePopProxy启用后生效，仅处理边缘返回手势，优先级低，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: shouldPopController
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义控制器返回VC开关句柄，enablePopProxy启用后生效，统一处理返回按钮点击和边缘返回手势，优先级高，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: enablePopProxy()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 单独启用返回代理拦截，优先级高于+enablePopProxy，启用后支持shouldPopController、allowsPopGesture功能，默认NO未启用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: enablePopProxy()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 全局启用返回代理拦截，优先级低于-enablePopProxy，启用后支持shouldPopController、allowsPopGesture功能，默认NO未启用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setDeviceTokenData(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置设备token原始Data，格式化并保存

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: deviceToken
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取设备Token格式化后的字符串

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: deviceModel
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取设备模型，格式："iPhone6,1"

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: deviceIDFV
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取设备IDFV(内部使用)，同账号应用全删除后会改变，可通过keychain持久化

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: deviceIDFA
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取设备IDFA(外部使用)，重置广告或系统后会改变，需先检测广告追踪权限，启用Tracking子模块后生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: deviceUUID
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取或设置设备UUID，自动keychain持久化。默认获取IDFV(未使用IDFA，避免额外权限)，失败则随机生成一个

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: isViewVisible
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 视图是否可见，视图hidden为NO、alpha>0.01、window存在且size不为0才认为可见

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: viewController
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取响应的视图控制器

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: touchInsets
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置额外热区(点击区域)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: fitFrame
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置自动计算适合高度的frame，需实现sizeThatFits:方法

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: fitSize
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 计算当前视图适合大小，需实现sizeThatFits:方法

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: fitSize(drawSize:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 计算指定边界，当前视图适合大小，需实现sizeThatFits:方法

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setShadowColor(_:offset:radius:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置阴影颜色、偏移和半径

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setBorderColor(_:width:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制四边边框

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setBorderColor(_:width:cornerRadius:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制四边边框和四角圆角

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setCornerRadius(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制四角圆角

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setBorderLayer(_:color:width:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制单边或多边边框Layer。frame必须存在(添加视图后可调用layoutIfNeeded更新frame)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setBorderLayer(_:color:width:leftInset:rightInset:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制单边或多边边框Layer。frame必须存在(添加视图后可调用layoutIfNeeded更新frame)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setCornerLayer(_:radius:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制单个或多个边框圆角，frame必须存在(添加视图后可调用layoutIfNeeded更新frame)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setCornerLayer(_:radius:borderColor:width:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制单个或多个边框圆角和四边边框，frame必须存在(添加视图后可调用layoutIfNeeded更新frame)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setBorderView(_:color:width:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制单边或多边边框视图。使用AutoLayout

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setBorderView(_:color:width:leftInset:rightInset:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 绘制单边或多边边框。使用AutoLayout

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: startCountDown(_:block:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 开始倒计时，从window移除时自动取消，回调参数为剩余时间

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: textAttributes
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速设置attributedText样式，设置后调用setText:会自动转发到setAttributedText:方法

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: lineHeight
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速设置文字的行高，优先级低于fwTextAttributes，设置后调用setText:会自动转发到setAttributedText:方法。小于0时恢复默认行高

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: contentInset
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义内容边距，未设置时为系统默认。当内容为空时不参与intrinsicContentSize和sizeThatFits:计算，方便自动布局

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: verticalAlignment
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 纵向分布方式，默认居中

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: addLinkGesture(block:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 添加点击手势并自动识别NSLinkAttributeName属性点击时触发回调block

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: attributes(gesture:allowsSpacing:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取手势触发位置的文本属性，可实现行内点击效果等，allowsSpacing默认为NO空白处不可点击。为了识别更准确，attributedText需指定font

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setFont(_:textColor:text:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速设置标签并指定文本

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: label(font:textColor:text:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速创建标签并指定文本

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: disabledAlpha
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义按钮禁用时的alpha，如0.5，默认0不生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: highlightedAlpha
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义按钮高亮时的alpha，如0.5，默认0不生效

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setTitle(_:font:textColor:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速设置文本按钮

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setTitle(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速设置文本

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setImage(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速设置图片

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setImageEdge(_:spacing:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置图片的居中边位置，需要在setImage和setTitle之后调用才生效，且button大小大于图片+文字+间距

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setBackgroundColor(_:for:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置状态背景色

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: button(title:font:titleColor:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速创建文本按钮

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: button(image:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 快速创建图片按钮

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: canScroll
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 判断当前scrollView内容是否足够滚动

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: canScrollHorizontal
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 判断当前的scrollView内容是否足够水平滚动

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: canScrollVertical
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 判断当前的scrollView内容是否足够纵向滚动

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: scroll(to:animated:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 当前scrollView滚动到指定边

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: isScroll(to:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否已滚动到指定边

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: contentOffset(of:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取当前的scrollView滚动到指定边时的contentOffset(包含contentInset)

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: totalPage
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 总页数，自动识别翻页方向

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: currentPage
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 当前页数，不支持动画，自动识别翻页方向

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: setCurrentPage(_:animated:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置当前页数，支持动画，自动识别翻页方向

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: isLastPage
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 是否是最后一页，自动识别翻页方向

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: preferredSize
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义圆点大小，默认{10, 10}

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: thumbSize
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 中间圆球的大小，默认zero

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: thumbColor
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 中间圆球的颜色，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: preferredSize
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义尺寸大小，默认{51,31}

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: maxLength
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 最大字数限制，0为无限制，二选一

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: maxUnicodeLength
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 最大Unicode字数限制(中文为1，英文为0.5)，0为无限制，二选一

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: textChangedBlock
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 自定义文字改变处理句柄，自动trimString，默认nil

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: textLengthChanged()
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 文本长度发生改变，自动检测字数限制，用于代码设置text等场景

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: filterText(_:)
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 获取满足最大字数限制的过滤后的文本，无需再调用textLengthChanged

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: autoCompleteInterval
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置自动完成时间间隔，默认1秒，和autoCompleteBlock配套使用

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: autoCompleteBlock
Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.abstract: 设置自动完成处理句柄，自动trimString，默认nil，注意输入框内容为空时会立即触发

Classes/Wrapper.html#/s:11FWFramework7Wr.name: maxLength

Categories/UIViewController%28FWNavigati.abstract: 关闭控制器，返回是否成功。1.如果导航栏不存在，则调用dismiss；2.否则如果已是导航栏底部，则调用dismiss；3.否则调用pop

Categories/UIViewController%28FWNavigati.name: -fw_closeViewControllerAnimated:completion:

Categories/UIViewController%28FWNavigati.name: fw_workflowName

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: fw_currentLanguage
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取应用当前语言，如果localizedLanguage存在则返回，否则返回systemLanguage

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: fw_systemLanguage
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取应用系统语言，返回preferredLocalizations(支持应用设置，不含区域)，示例：zh-Hans|en

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: fw_localizedLanguage
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取或设置自定义本地化语言，未自定义时为空。(语言值对应本地化文件存在才会立即生效，如zh-Hans|en)，为空时清空自定义，会触发通知。默认只处理mainBundle语言，如果需要处理三方SDK和系统组件语言，详见Bundle分类

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: +fw_localizedString:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取本地化字符串，strings文件需位于mainBundle，支持动态切换

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: +fw_localizedString:table:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取本地化字符串，指定table，strings文件需位于mainBundle，支持动态切换

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: +fw_bundleWithName:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 加载指定名称bundle对象，bundle文件需位于mainBundle

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: +fw_bundleWithClass:name:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 加载指定类所在bundle对象，可指定子目录名称，一般用于Framework内bundle文件

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: +fw_localizedString:bundle:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取指定bundle内strings文件本地化字符串，支持动态切换

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: +fw_localizedString:table:bundle:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 读取指定bundle内strings文件本地化字符串，指定table，支持动态切换

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: -fw_localizedBundle
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 根据本地化语言加载当前bundle内语言文件，支持动态切换

Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.name: -fw_localizedBundleWithLanguage:
Categories/NSBundle%28FWLanguage%29.html.abstract: 加载当前bundle内指定语言文件，加载失败返回nil

Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.name: fw_placeholderInset
Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.abstract: 自定义占位文本内间距，默认zero与内容一致

Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.name: fw_verticalAlignment
Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.abstract: 自定义垂直分布方式，会自动修改contentInset，默认Top与系统一致

Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.name: fw_autoHeightEnabled
Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.abstract: 是否启用自动高度功能，随文字改变高度

Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.name: fw_maxHeight
Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.abstract: 最大高度，默认CGFLOAT_MAX，启用自动高度后生效

Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.name: fw_minHeight
Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.abstract: 最小高度，默认0，启用自动高度后生效

Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.name: fw_heightDidChange
Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.abstract: 高度改变回调句柄，默认nil，启用自动高度后生效

Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.name: -fw_autoHeightWithMaxHeight:didChange:
Categories/UITextView%28FWPlaceholder%29.abstract: 快捷启用自动高度，并设置最大高度和回调句柄

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_keyboardManager
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 是否启用键盘管理(自动滚动)，默认NO

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_keyboardDistance
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 设置输入框和键盘的空白高度，默认10.0

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_reboundDistance
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 设置输入框和键盘的回弹触发最小距离，默认0始终回弹

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_keyboardResign
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 是否启用键盘后台关闭处理，退后台时收起键盘，回到前台时恢复键盘，解决系统退后台输入框跳动问题，默认NO

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_touchResign
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 是否启用点击背景关闭键盘(会继续触发其它点击事件)，默认NO

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_keyboardScrollView
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 指定用于键盘管理滚动的scrollView，默认为nil，通过修改VC.view.frame实现

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_returnResign
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 点击键盘完成按钮是否关闭键盘，默认NO，二选一。此方法会修改delegate，可使用fwDelegate访问原始delegate

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_returnNext
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 设置点击键盘完成按钮是否自动切换下一个输入框，二选一。此方法会修改delegate，可使用fwDelegate访问原始delegate

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_returnBlock
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 设置点击键盘完成按钮的事件句柄。此方法会修改delegate，可使用fwDelegate访问原始delegate

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_delegate
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 调用上面三个方法后会修改delegate，此方法始终访问外部delegate

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_keyboardToolbar
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 获取关联的键盘Toolbar对象，可自定义

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_toolbarPreviousButton
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 自定义键盘Toolbar上一个按钮，支持图片|字符串等(详见FWBlock)，默认朝上的箭头

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_toolbarNextButton
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 自定义键盘Toolbar下一个按钮，支持图片|字符串等(详见FWBlock)，默认朝下的箭头

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_toolbarDoneButton

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_previousResponder
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击前一个按钮时聚焦的输入框句柄，默认nil

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_nextResponder
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击下一个按钮时聚焦的输入框句柄，默认nil

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: fw_previousResponderTag
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 设置Toolbar点击前一个按钮时聚焦的输入框tag，默认0不生效

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 自动跳转前一个输入框，优先使用previousResponder，其次根据responderTag查找

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: -fw_goNext
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 自动跳转后一个输入框，优先使用nextResponder，其次根据responderTag查找

Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.name: -fw_keyboardHeight:
Categories/UITextView%28FWKeyboard%29.ht.abstract: 获取键盘弹出时的高度，对应Key为UIKeyboardFrameEndUserInfoKey
